text: Rodrigo "Rod" Richard Barajas (born September 5, 1975) is a former professional baseball player. He played in Major League Baseball for the Arizona Diamondbacks, Texas Rangers, Philadelphia Phillies, Toronto Blue Jays, New York Mets, Los Angeles Dodgers and Pittsburgh Pirates. Barajas has also played with the Mexico national baseball team. title: Rod Barajas
